elements.name: Check if the user can register successfully through email OTP authentication

steps.name: user launches the InstaBee portal on browser
user lands on registration page by clicking the try InstaBee free button
user enters the name
user enters the email
user enters the mobile
user enters the password
user enters the confirm password
user hit submit registration button
user lands on the 2FA page
user gets OTP from the email for registration
user enters the OTP and hit submit
user should land on home page successfully

elements.name: Check if the user can login using the email & password successfully

steps.name: user launches the InstaBee portal on browser
user lands on login page by clicking the login button
user enters email on the login page
user enters password on the login page
user clicks submit login button on the login page
user should land on home page successfully

elements.name: Check if the user can login using the gmail email & password successfully

steps.name: user launches the InstaBee portal on browser
user lands on login page by clicking the login button
user clicks the gmail login button
user enters the gmail email and hit next
user enters the gmail password
user hit submit
user should land on home page successfully

elements.name: Check if the user can login using mobile OTP

steps.name: user launches the InstaBee portal on browser
user lands on login page by clicking the login button
user clicks the login with OTP button
user enters the valid phone number registered with the player and hit verify
user gets OTP from the email for login
user enters the OTP and hit submit
user should land on home page successfully

elements.name: Check if the user can successfully

steps.name: user launches the InstaBee portal on browser
user lands on login page by clicking the login button
user enters email on the login page
user enters password on the login page
user clicks submit login button on the login page
user should land on home page successfully
user clicks the options menu
user clicks sign out button
user gets logged out successfully

elements.name: Check if the user can use 2FA login feature by toggle ON from profile page. Also can disable the same from profile page

steps.name: user launches the InstaBee portal on browser
user lands on login page by clicking the login button
user enters email on the login page
user enters password on the login page
user clicks submit login button on the login page
user should land on home page successfully
user clicks the options menu
user opens the profile page
user click enable 2FA button
user enter password to confirm 2FA popup
user hit submit button to confirm 2FA popup
user is show with QA code, field to enter the auth code and confirm button

elements.name: Check if all the sections on profile page are loaded and user can update personla info

steps.name: user launches the InstaBee portal on browser
user lands on login page by clicking the login button
user enters email on the login page
user enters password on the login page
user clicks submit login button on the login page
user should land on home page successfully
user clicks the options menu
user opens the profile page
profile info section is present on profile page
update password section is present on profile page
2FA section is present on profile page
broswer sessions section is present on profile page
delete account section is present on profile page
user updates profile information on profile info section
user clicks the options menu
user clicks logout link
user lands on login page by clicking the login button
user enters the updated email on the login page
user enters password on the login page
user clicks submit login button on the login page
user should land on home page successfully

name: Validate user profile page and update personal details

elements.name: Check if the user can change password successfully through forgot password flow

steps.name: user launches the InstaBee portal on browser
user lands on login page by clicking the login button
user clicks forgot password link
user lands on forgot password rest email sending page
user enters emails and hit submit
password reset email sent successfully
user lands on password reset page by following link in email
user enters email, password and confirm password on password reset page
user clicks reset password button
player lands on login page and password reset successfully message is shown
user enters email on the login page
user enters new password on the login page
user clicks submit login button on the login page
user should land on home page successfully

elements.name: Check if the user can change password from profile page and re-login with new password

steps.name: user launches the InstaBee portal on browser
user lands on login page by clicking the login button
user enters email on the login page
user enters new password on the login page
user clicks submit login button on the login page
user should land on home page successfully
user clicks the options menu
user opens the profile page
user enters the current password on update password section
user enters the new password on update password section
user enters the confirm password on the update password section
user hits save button
user clicks the options menu
user clicks logout link
user lands on login page by clicking the login button
user enters email on the login page
user enters password on the login page
user clicks submit login button on the login page
user should land on home page successfully
